benefits.qualitativeBenefits: Improves client experience, increases control transparency, and reduces manual processing risk.
benefits.financialAssumptions: Benefits ramp from pilot to full rollout over 12-18 months, with conservative adoption and contingency buffers.
benefits.intangibleAssumptions: Assumes stronger compliance posture, better staff experience, and lower operational disruption incidents.

projectOverview.projectDescription: Dummy scenario 10: Dummy Funding Request 5 focuses on digital onboarding simplification and data quality uplift. Assumptions and financial detail are populated for QA and workflow validation.
projectOverview.opportunityStatement: Current-state manual effort and fragmented tooling create avoidable delays, cost variance, and control risk.

strategyAlignment.enterpriseStrategyAlignment: Supports simplification, control uplift, and scalable digital delivery in line with strategic priorities.
strategyAlignment.keyDependencies: Data platform readiness, architecture review approval, and sponsor-aligned rollout sequencing.

resourceRequirements.internalFteRequirements: 4 internal FTE across delivery, product, and control functions.
resourceRequirements.externalSupportRequired: Targeted vendor delivery support for implementation and specialist configuration.
resourceRequirements.additionalResourceDetails: Blend of permanent and temporary capacity to cover peak implementation windows.

humanResources.responsibilities: Plan delivery, manage RAID log, and coordinate governance submissions.
humanResources.comments: Core coordination role across delivery and governance teams.

technologyApplicationResources.rationaleForCompletingWork: Required to remove manual controls and enable consistent cross-team execution.
technologyApplicationResources.decommissionOpportunity: Retire two legacy macros and one reporting utility.

userExperience.impactDescription: Reduces handoffs and rework for frontline and back-office users.

investmentRegulationSolution.rationaleForCompletingWork: Aligns platform controls with target-state governance and reporting requirements.

financialSummary.financialImpactsIncludingWorkforceOperat: Estimated annual savings 270,000 with revenue uplift 59,400; ongoing opex impact 130,000.

approvals.requiredStakeholderApprovals: Business Sponsor; Finance PMO; Technology Architecture; Data Governance; Risk & Controls.

benefitRealizationPlan.nonFinancialBenefitsSummary: Improved governance transparency, audit readiness, and stakeholder confidence.

benefitRealizationPlan.otherEnterpriseBenefits: Reusable controls and reporting patterns for adjacent initiatives.
